comments.text:
Mango is so stupidly easy and the glass thing was dumb. For a big mango you 
do cut off the two most fleshy sides but forget the glass, just score the 
inner pulp with a knife in tic-tac-toe type liness and pop the pulp from 
inside to outside.

If you have small mangos, just squish them with all the skin intact then 
bite a tiny hole at the bottom of the mango and suck out the juice. It's 
the best!﻿

comments.text:
*一秒钟祛草莓蒂 6种水果正确吃法 （视频）*

来源:大纪元记者周慧心综合报导 | 日期:2015-04-25 | 网址: http://www.aboluowang.com

水果对身体有益，大多数人都喜欢吃水果。不过日常生活中很多人吃水果的方法是错误的，比如吃草莓时，许多人用刀子直接切除草莓蒂，将草莓肉一起切掉了，很是浪费，有一个非常简单的方法，一秒中就可以祛除草莓蒂，又不浪费果肉。BuzzFeed教大家这6种水果的正确切法。

1.奇异果(狝猴桃)
错误：用刀直接削皮，像削苹果。

正确：用刀将奇异果顶端切掉，然后拿杓子，紧贴着皮转圈，将果肉与皮分离。

2.石榴
错误：直接用手剥皮。

正确：将石榴从中间切半，然后取一容器，将石榴肉面向容器，用木杓敲打石榴后背，石榴肉都会掉到容器中。

3.芒果
错误：用刀削皮。

正确：将芒果切半，把果肉对准玻璃杯口，轻轻一刮，芒果肉就掉入杯中。

4.橙
错误：用手直接剥皮。

正确：用刀在橙子中间将皮划开(不要切到肉)，然后将橙子皮“脱”下来。

5.草莓
错误：用刀将草莓蒂整个切除。

正确：用一根吸管，将草莓蒂直接“推”出来。

6.西瓜
错误：将西瓜切片。

正确：将西瓜对半切开，然后在半个西瓜皮两侧各竖切三刀，再沿着西瓜肉边缘将西瓜剥离西瓜皮，最后将西瓜横、竖各切3刀。将果肉倒入一个容器，西瓜沙拉完成。

下面的视频给你更多细节。现在就试试吧。**

[郑重声明: 新闻和文章取自世界媒体和论坛，本则消息未经严格核实, 也不代表《阿波罗网》观点。]

本文地址: http://www.aboluowang.com/news/2015/0425/547226.html﻿

comments.author: WaCzup

comments.text:
You don't have to make things anywhere near this complicated.

Just cut the top off a kiwi and eat it with a spoon like a pudding.
Eat the strawberry by holding the stalk and eating around it.
Cut the mango in half, cross-hatch it and turn the skin inside out to make 
a hedgehog, then eat it straight off of the skin.
Keep the bottom half of the orange skin on to give you something to hold 
while eating it.
Just cut the melon into wedges like you'd slice a cake and eat it straight 
out of the rind.﻿

comments.author: anna byrne

comments.text:
NO THAT IS NOT HOW YOU EAT A POMEGRANATE OH GOD NO THE HORROR!!! There is a 
very exact technique to eating a pomegranate, and THAT'S NOT IT! It 
involves tracing a circle around the top with a knife, ripping off the 
skin, but it should come off like a little hat, then you take the knife and 
trace the bumps on the sides, which is where the pomegranate naturally 
falls open, at which point you simple remove the inside skin with grace. No 
blood spilt, no persians insulted, no pomegranates disgraced. ﻿
